argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tdeglem.a | |- A = { m e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' m " NN ) e. Fin } |
| 2 |  | tdeglem.h | |- H = ( h e. A |-> ( CCfld gsum h ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cnfld0 | |- 0 = ( 0g ` CCfld ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cnfldadd | |- + = ( +g ` CCfld ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 7 |  | #P_ringcmn | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> CCfld e. CMnd ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mp1i | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> CCfld e. CMnd ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> I e. V ) |
| 10 | 1 | #P_psrbagf | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A ) -> X : I --> NN0 ) |
| 11 |  | #P_nn0sscn | |- NN0 C_ CC |
| 12 |  | #P_fss | |- ( ( X : I --> NN0 /\ NN0 C_ CC ) -> X : I --> CC ) |
| 13 | 10, 11, 12 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A ) -> X : I --> CC ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> X : I --> CC ) |
| 15 | 1 | #P_psrbagf | |- ( ( I e. V /\ Y e. A ) -> Y : I --> NN0 ) |
| 16 |  | #P_fss | |- ( ( Y : I --> NN0 /\ NN0 C_ CC ) -> Y : I --> CC ) |
| 17 | 15, 11, 16 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ Y e. A ) -> Y : I --> CC ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> Y : I --> CC ) |
| 19 | 1 | #P_psrbagfsupp | |- ( ( X e. A /\ I e. V ) -> X finSupp 0 ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A ) -> X finSupp 0 ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> X finSupp 0 ) |
| 22 | 1 | #P_psrbagfsupp | |- ( ( Y e. A /\ I e. V ) -> Y finSupp 0 ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( I e. V /\ Y e. A ) -> Y finSupp 0 ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> Y finSupp 0 ) |
| 25 | 3, 4, 5, 8, 9, 14, 18, 21, 24 | #P_gsumadd | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( CCfld gsum ( X oF + Y ) ) = ( ( CCfld gsum X ) + ( CCfld gsum Y ) ) ) |
| 26 | 1 | #P_psrbagaddcl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( X oF + Y ) e. A ) |
| 27 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( h = ( X oF + Y ) -> ( CCfld gsum h ) = ( CCfld gsum ( X oF + Y ) ) ) |
| 28 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( CCfld gsum ( X oF + Y ) ) e. _V |
| 29 | 27, 2, 28 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( ( X oF + Y ) e. A -> ( H ` ( X oF + Y ) ) = ( CCfld gsum ( X oF + Y ) ) ) |
| 30 | 26, 29 | #P_syl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( H ` ( X oF + Y ) ) = ( CCfld gsum ( X oF + Y ) ) ) |
| 31 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( h = X -> ( CCfld gsum h ) = ( CCfld gsum X ) ) |
| 32 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( CCfld gsum X ) e. _V |
| 33 | 31, 2, 32 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( X e. A -> ( H ` X ) = ( CCfld gsum X ) ) |
| 34 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( h = Y -> ( CCfld gsum h ) = ( CCfld gsum Y ) ) |
| 35 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( CCfld gsum Y ) e. _V |
| 36 | 34, 2, 35 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( Y e. A -> ( H ` Y ) = ( CCfld gsum Y ) ) |
| 37 | 33, 36 | #P_oveqan12d | |- ( ( X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( ( H ` X ) + ( H ` Y ) ) = ( ( CCfld gsum X ) + ( CCfld gsum Y ) ) ) |
| 38 | 37 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( ( H ` X ) + ( H ` Y ) ) = ( ( CCfld gsum X ) + ( CCfld gsum Y ) ) ) |
| 39 | 25, 30, 38 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( I e. V /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( H ` ( X oF + Y ) ) = ( ( H ` X ) + ( H ` Y ) ) ) |
